verses.verse: And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H1696>communed<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> them, and <S%H413>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak, <S%H1696><s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H4100>Whether<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> for you, either that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> which are threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H376>persons,<s%> <S%H4910>reign<s%> over you, <S%H518>or<s%> that <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4910>reign<s%> over you? <S%H2142>remember<s%> also <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am your <S%H6106>bone<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> him in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words:<s%> and their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> inclined to <S%H5186>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H40>Abimelech;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>He<s%> is our <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%> out of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H1170>Baal-berith,<s%> wherewith <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H7386>vain<s%> and <S%H6348>light<s%> <S%H376>persons,<s%> which <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And he <S%H935>went<s%> unto his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal,<s%> being threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H376>persons,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone:<s%> notwithstanding yet <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> the <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> was <S%H3498>left;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hid <S%H2244>himself.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> gathered <S%H622>together,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the house of <S%H1037>Millo,<s%> and <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> the <S%H436>plain<s%> of the <S%H5324>pillar<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And when they <S%H5046>told<s%> it to <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim,<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H7121>cried,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, ye <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you.

The <S%H6086>trees<s%> went <S%H1980>forth<s%> <S%H1980><s%> on a time to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them; and they <S%H559>said<s%> unto the olive <S%H2132>tree,<s%> <S%H4427>Reign<s%> thou <S%H5921>over<s%> us.

But the olive <S%H2132>tree<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Should I <S%H2308>leave<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1880>fatness,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> by me they <S%H3513>honor<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to be <S%H5128>promoted<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6086>trees?<s%>
And the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the fig <S%H8384>tree,<s%> <S%H1980>Come<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us.

But the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Should I <S%H2308>forsake<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4987>sweetness,<s%> and my <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8570>fruit,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to be <S%H5128>promoted<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6086>trees?<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> unto the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> <S%H1980>Come<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us.

And the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Should I <S%H2308>leave<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H8492>wine,<s%> which <S%H8055>cheereth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to be <S%H5128>promoted<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6086>trees?<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H329>bramble,<s%> <S%H1980>Come<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us.

And the <S%H329>bramble<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H4886>anoint<s%> me <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, then <S%H935>come<s%> and put your <S%H2620>trust<s%> in my <S%H6738>shadow:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H369>not,<s%> let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H329>bramble,<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, <S%H518>if<s%> ye have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H571>truly<s%> and <S%H8549>sincerely,<s%> in that ye have made Abimelech <S%H4427>king,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H40><s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> ye have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2896>well<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto him according to the <S%H1576>deserving<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands;<s%>

(For <S%H834><s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> you, and <S%H7993>adventured<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H4480>far,<s%> <S%H5048><s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of Midian: <S%H4080><s%>

And <S%H859>ye<s%> are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and have <S%H2026>slain<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H376>persons,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> and have <S%H853>made<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is your <S%H251>brother;)<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> ye then have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H571>truly<s%> and <S%H8549>sincerely<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> then <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> ye in <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and let <S%H1931>him<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in you:

But <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H369>not,<s%> let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Abimelech,<s%> <S%H40><s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4407>Millo;<s%> and let <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H4480>men<s%> <S%H1167><s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H4407>Millo,<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

And <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> ran <S%H5127>away,<s%> and <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H876>Beer,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> for <S%H4480>fear<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%>
When <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> had <S%H7786>reigned<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with Abimelech: <S%H40><s%>

That the <S%H2555>cruelty<s%> done to the threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> might <S%H935>come,<s%> and their <S%H1818>blood<s%> be <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> their <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> them; and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H2388>aided<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> him in the <S%H2026>killing<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

And the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> liers in <S%H693>wait<s%> for him <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and they <S%H1497>robbed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> came <S%H5674>along<s%> that <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> them: and it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and went <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem:<s%> and the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> put their <S%H982>confidence<s%> in him.

And they went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and <S%H1219>gathered<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H1869>trod<s%> the grapes, and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1974>merry,<s%> and went <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H430>god,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> him? is <S%H3808>not<s%> he the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal?<s%> and <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> his <S%H6496>officer?<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7928>Shechem:<s%> for <S%H4069>why<s%> should <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> him?

And would to <S%H4310>God<s%> <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> were under my <S%H3027>hand!<s%> then would I <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> <S%H7235>Increase<s%> thine <S%H6635>army,<s%> and come <S%H3318>out.<s%>

And when <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed,<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled.<s%>

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H8649>privily,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> be <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they <S%H6696>fortify<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H6965>up<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> thee, and lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> as soon as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H2224>up,<s%> thou shalt rise <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H6584>set<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> when <S%H1931>he<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> him come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> thee, then mayest thou <S%H6213>do<s%> to them <S%H834>as<s%> thou shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3027>occasion.<s%>

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5973>with<s%> him, by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and they laid <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>companies.<s%>

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H4480>from<s%> lying in <S%H3993>wait.<s%>

And when <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2083>Zebul,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there come people <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5971><s%> from the <S%H4480>top<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%> And <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H859>Thou<s%> <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> as if they were <S%H376>men.<s%>

And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>See<s%> there come people <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H2872>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> along <S%H4480>by<s%> <S%H5973><s%> the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H6049>Meonenim.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2083>Zebul<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H346>Where<s%> is <S%H645>now<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> thou <S%H559>saidst,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> him? is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H3988>despised?<s%> go <S%H3318>out,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with them.
And <S%H1603>Gaal<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%>

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7291>chased<s%> him, and he <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and <S%H7227>many<s%> were <S%H5307>overthrown<s%> and <S%H2491>wounded,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
